title: Fix TUI blank screen - CSS grid layout mismatch
description:
**Problem**: Running `uv run watchtower` shows blank screen.

**Investigation**:
- CLI commands (agents, inbox) work fine
- Core library discovers 12 root agents correctly
- Textual 7.2.0 installed

**Root Cause**: CSS grid layout mismatch in app.py:
- `grid-rows: 1fr 3` specifies 2 rows
- compose() yields 4 elements: Header, main-container, status-bar, Footer
- Textual may be unable to layout properly

**Fix Required**:
1. Update CSS to match actual widget count
2. Or restructure compose() to fit the grid layout
3. Test TUI renders correctly after fix

**Files**: src/watchtower/tui/app.py (lines 23-28 CSS)
close_reason: Fixed by changing grid-size: 1 to grid-size: 1 2. Header/Footer use dock so only main-container and status-bar need grid rows.
